price: O sizin üçün yaşıl ağacdan od əmələ gətirdi. Budur, siz indi ondan od yandırırsınız”.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلۡأَخۡضَرِ نَارٗا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنۡهُ تُوقِدُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakum mina al-shajari al-akhḍari nāran fa-idhā antum min'hu tūqidūna
